originalText.text: Bespoke My Heart did an amazing job with our wedding. They were helpful and thoughtful throughout the process, and everything ran smoothly on the day-of. They were great about coordinating the tent/tables/chairs/linens, as well as the catering. Since we invited families, Bespoke My Heart included a children's play area in our package, and our friends with kids raved about how great it was. I recommend them to others without reservation!!

originalText.text:
Their work is simply awesome! They provide amazingly handcrafted decorations, custom designed cake, snacks and basically everything you might ask.
Managing my 2-year old son's party, they offered an elegantly organized table layout with stations for kid entertainment on top of all the decorations and gift favor bags.
I could not recommend them more!

text.text:

originalText.text:
Bespoke My Heart made our son's second birthday an extremely enjoyable event. Usually, we rented out the party room in our building for our son's birthday. That meant that we had to take care of food, decorations, cake, party favors, invitations, and the list goes on and on. Bespoke My Heart took care of all that, in a much better way than we could ever have. We just had to choose the party theme and show up to the party. It doesn't get easier than that.

The theme was "Racing Cars" and everything was creatively related to the theme. The kids were playing with small cars on the racing track tablecloth, cupcakes were decorated as traffic lights, they even built a wooden race track. The cake looked amazing and it was tasty too.

If you want to have a party to remember, not stress about it but have it taken care of by professionals, don't hesitate to call Bespoke My Heart.

originalText.text: I love living here, I can’t think of a luckier place to land my first years in New York than the octagon.

text.text: I love living here, I can’t think of a luckier place to land my first years in New York than the octagon.

originalText.text: Eric and Natalia did a wonderful job planning, setting up and organizing our daughter's 4th birthday.  They took our idea of "Moana-ish party" and created a beautiful island paradise in the backyard.  The children and their parents were enchanted.  I highly recommend them for any party - adult or child, large or small.  Their attention to detail is fantastic and they truly put their heart into all of their work.
